Headline: #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express, #136 Sheridan/LaSalle Express & #143 Stockton/Michigan Express Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lake Shore Drive/Division
ShortDescription: SB 135 Clarendon/LaSalle Exp, 136 Sheridan/LaSalle Exp & 143 Stockton/Mchgan Exp buses are rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Drive, North Ave & Inner Lake Shore Dr.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #135 Clarendon/LaSalle Express, #136 Sheridan/LaSalle Express & #143 Stockton/Michigan Express buses are rerouted via Outer Lake Shore Drive, North Ave & Inner Lake Shore Drive: due to street blockage near Lake Shore Drive/Division.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
